body_html:
Yes this is on purpose. There is no semantics on params. for example we cannot assume that each estimators params has a field 'learning_rate' or 'feature_column'. Framework developers depending on estimator should not rely on params.
User needs to control the construction of Estimator to play with hyper parameters.
body_text:
Yes this is on purpose. There is no semantics on params. for example we cannot assume that each estimators params has a field 'learning_rate' or 'feature_column'. Framework developers depending on estimator should not rely on params.
User needs to control the construction of Estimator to play with hyper parameters.
body:
Yes this is on purpose. There is no semantics on params. for example we cannot assume that each estimators params has a field 'learning_rate' or 'feature_column'. Framework developers depending on estimator should not rely on params.
User needs to control the construction of Estimator to play with hyper parameters.
